After many experiments the team here is onto a discovery.

The perspiration of a stressed Kerbal can be refined into top notch high octane fuel. In other words. Kerbal Sweat = Rocket Fuel.

Yes?

No?

Considering some of the facial expressions that the kerbals have while riding/piloting some of the insane crafts I have built. This made me think they must be sweating themselves silly. Just a simple indicator of sweat produced based on the terror the kerbal goes through. Then methinks there should be a way to turn that sweat to fuel. So, here goes a mod to create a simple and fun fuel mining mechanic.

Kerbals will sweat each day just doing nothing.

More fun/excitment = More Sweat

Sweat + Material Science Lab + Electric = Fuel + Oxidizer

This would not create lots of fuel but anything is better than nothing. Current mining mods once in place seem kinda boring to watch them extract fuel from the ground. An amusement park with rides to scare the bejebus and sweat out of the kerbals would be an exciting and possibly dangerous way to gather a resource. Rocket sled with high G-force braking is an example.

More ideas to follow once this code skelton is up.
